div.pre: 2223 Agrigento, 1918 (442) Burial: 250-200 B.C. (K) Contents: c. 900 AE. "In a vase-Hera's temple" Hieron II (Poseidon/trident) Disposition: Agrigento Note in ANS Noe's reference to "Giesecke, XVII, 5 ?" (4th cent. Zeus/thunderbolt) is puz- zling, because the ANS note clearly draws the rev. type as a trident and compares the size to a didr.
